text: Ross Bekkering is a Canadian-Dutch retired professional basketball player. Bekkering competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Ross BEKKERING He was born on 19 August 1987.Ross Bekkering == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Canadian basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Dutch basketball players Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Alberta
title: Ross Bekkering
